name: Maximum Bash
description:
Maximum Bash is a bullet hell game that comes with a completely randomly generated map and in which the opponents get stronger and stronger.

!!CAUTION!!

The game is currently still in the prototype stage, but it shouldn't keep you from playing and having fun .

Controls:

Movement => WSAD.

Attack direction  with the mouse and attacking with left mouse button.

Press and hold E to open doors.
